header.title: Artifex.AI Studio Pro
header.subtitle: From product descriptions to video storyboards, bring your ideas to life with AI.

tooltips.saveToGallery: Save current work to your gallery
tooltips.exportProject: Export the current project to a .json file

common.koreanDetected: Korean input detected. Consider using the Korean language setting for best results.
common.koreanDetectedIdea: Korean input detected. Consider setting the description language to Korean.
common.importFailure: Failed to import projects. The file might be corrupt or in the wrong format.

descriptionForm.keyFeaturesPlaceholder: e.g., Lumbar support, breathable mesh, adjustable armrests, silent wheels

storyboardForm.storyIdeaPlaceholder: e.g., A cinematic trailer for a futuristic flying car weaving through a neon-lit cyberpunk city.
storyboardForm.storyIdeaHint: Provide a clear, concise idea. The AI will break it down into scenes.

storyboardSettings.title: Storyboard Settings
storyboardSettings.videoNote: Video aspect ratio is determined by the Image aspect ratio. Resolution and framerate are optimized by the model for the highest quality.

storyboardDisplay.title: Generated Storyboard
storyboardDisplay.imageError: Image generation failed. Please try regenerating.
storyboardDisplay.quotaError: You may have reached your image generation limit.
storyboardDisplay.quotaErrorCheckPlan: Please check your plan and billing details on {{link}}.
storyboardDisplay.checkPlan: Please check your plan and billing details.
storyboardDisplay.generateClipTitle: Generate a video clip for this scene
storyboardDisplay.generatingClipHint: This can take a few minutes.
storyboardDisplay.generateClipPrompt: Generate a clip to see the result.

detailedModal.title: Expand and Edit Scene
detailedModal.loadingMessage:
Generating detailed shots and images...
This may take a moment.

apiKeyInstructions.title: API Key Required
apiKeyInstructions.welcome: To use Artifex.AI Studio Pro, you need to set up your Google AI API key.
apiKeyInstructions.howTo: How to get your API key:
apiKeyInstructions.step1: Go to {{link}} and create an API key.
apiKeyInstructions.step2: In the Code Editor, find the "Secrets" tab (usually on the left panel).
apiKeyInstructions.step3: Add a new secret with the name {{apiKey}} and paste your key as the value.
apiKeyInstructions.disclaimer: Your API key is stored securely as an environment variable and is not exposed on the client-side.

galleryModal.title: My Gallery
galleryModal.noProjects: You have no saved projects yet.

mediaArt.selectImagePrompt: Click to Select a Source Image
mediaArt.selectImageSubprompt: Choose from a classic painting or upload your own.
mediaArt.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this scene? This action cannot be undone.

imageModal.title: Select Source Image
imageModal.uploadCTA: Click to Upload an Image File
imageModal.uploadHint: PNG, JPG, or WEBP files are recommended.
imageModal.orSelect: Or select a masterpiece from the gallery

mediaArtStyles.subtleMotionDesc: Gentle, slow movements in key elements of the image.
mediaArtStyles.parallaxDesc: Creates a 3D effect by moving layers at different speeds.
mediaArtStyles.dreamlikeDesc: Flowing, liquid-like distortions and surreal transitions.
mediaArtStyles.elementalDesc: Adds natural effects like wind, rain, or shimmering light.
